name: Diversion
description:
This game was made for the teamseas jam! Hope you like it! I didn't spend much time on it but it is what it is and I hope you enjoy.

You might have to full screen for proper layout of the UI (recommended depending on how it turns out on your screen)

Description:
___________________

In this game you goal is to divert fishing boats to collect trash instead of fish. 

You do this by changing the direction of the boats by clicking on them and draging your mouse from left to right. 

As the game goes on more and more trash spawns and also there will be more and more fishing boats you have to control

Make sure that they dont crash as you only have 3 lives! 

Good luck! Enjoy! 

#TeamSeas

Asset Credits:

All assets were taken from the unity asset store
